channel.title: NGW Server Project (455 Cache), With forums. Coded from scratch
channel.description:
I am posting here to inform the community about the New Gamers World 455 Server project. (aka NGW 455 Server), it will be coded from no source, and will be incredibly stable. It will incorporate the use of the Python programming language. It is supported by the newest, fastest-growing Rs2 Private Server community, New Gamers World. We are recruiting coders, and supporters.
The home forums for the server project are here: http://server.newgamersworld.com The forums for the site that is making it is here: www.newgamersworld.com
I am co-owner of New Gamers World, and we have 300+ members now, and a server status. I suggest you people join, and become a part of the new community.
And for those of you who can code well, you are welcome to help us code the server project. Just PM me here, on New Gamers World, or add me at blakeman8192@hotmail.com
